metadata.title: Mark Recovery Program  (Canada)

creators.name: Ocean Canada - Pacific Region, Pacific Biological Station

metadata.description:
Mark Recovery Program  (Canada)

Measurement Details
Coded-wire tagged and/or adipose-clipped Chinook, coho, pink, sockeye, chum and steelhead are sampled for age, sexual maturity, length, weight and color for stock composition, exploitation and survival rates, hatchery contribution and run-timing.

Geographic Area
Coastal British Columbia

Other Comments
Data are complete for Chinook and coho from 1975, steelhead from 1976, and chum from 1979.  Pink and sockeye data are intermittent back to 1984 and 1978, respectively.
  [ A TCODE project ]
